# contentInset

**Instance Property**

The distance that the content is inset from the edge of the browser view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var contentInset: UIEdgeInsets { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to add to the scrollable area around the content. The insets are measured in points. The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/UIKit/UIEdgeInsets/zero].

## Managing the Browser’s Appearance

- **contentOffset**: The distance that the content is offset from the browser’s origin.
- **setContentOffset(_:animated:)**: Sets the offset distance between the content and the browser’s origin.
- **stickerSize**: The size of the stickers in the browser.
